name: nokia 3310 multigame
description:
choose between multiple mini-games

Use ↑ and ↓ to navigate the menu and use enter to select

if you want to play road rush use ← and → to move around. Use ↑ and ↓ to control the car speed.

if you want to play flappy use ↑ to jump.

thanks for playing :)

ps. sounds in the web version are bugged, if you want to hear the normal sound. download the file.
